short_summary: Purchase of spares , The items to be delivered are 8 pins,
description: Delivery of spares to CFB  Halifax,contract includes 8 pins, one Groove pin and headed pin,previusly purchased in year, varied nature of delivery date of delivery
full_summary:
### Tender Notice - Multiple Victoria-Class Spares 

#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference:** PW-22-01007422
** Solicitation Number:** W8482-230719/A
**Publication Date:** September 16, 2022 
**Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, 2:00:00 PM 

The Department of National Defence invites bids for multiple Victoria-Class Spares. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Items Required:**

* Item 1: 8 units of PIN, GROOVE, HEADED, Part No.: 9517A-3, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 2: 4 units of PIN, GROOVE, HEADED, Part No.: 9517A-3, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 3: 8 units of PIN, GROOVED, HEADED, Part No.: 9599A-3, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 4: 4 units of PIN, GROOVED, HEADED, Part No.: 9599A-3, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 5: 8 units of PIN, RAM FOLLOWER LIP, Part No.: 9738A, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 6: 4 units of PIN, RAM FOLLOWER LIP, Part No.: 9738A, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 7: 8 units of PIN, STRAIGHT, HEADED, Part No.: 5132A-A, NCAGE: K3902
* Item 8: 4 units of PIN, STRAIGHT, HEADED, Part No.: 5132A-A, NCAGE: K3902

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE offered.

**Relevant Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Leach, Cassandra
cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca
999-999-9999

**Tender Documents:**
The RFP document
